RefConfigFile.Description: Definitions for the header file usbpd_dpm_conf.h
RefConfigFile.Name: USBPD_DPM_CONF

Argument.Name: USBPD_NbPorts
Argument.Comment: The number of the USBPD ports

Argument.Name: USBPD_XID
Argument.Comment: Value provided by the USB-IF assigned to the product

Argument.Name: GUI_V1_8_0_OR_NEWER
Argument.Comment: GUI Version embedded in FW package

Argument.Name: PE_DR_Swap_To_DFP_P0
Argument.Comment: Port 0 Data Swap to DFP support

Argument.Name: PE_DR_Swap_To_UFP_P0
Argument.Comment: Port 0 Data Swap to UFP support

Argument.Name: PE_RespondsToDiscovSOP_P0
Argument.Comment: Port 0 Can respond successfully to a Discover Identity

Argument.Name: PE_AttemptsDiscovSOP_P0
Argument.Comment: Port 0 Can send a Discover Identits

Argument.Name: Is_GetBattery_Supported_P0
Argument.Comment: Port 0 Get Battery Capability and Status messages

Argument.Comment: Number of Source PDOs for port 0

Argument.Comment: Number of Sink PDOs for port 0

Argument.Name: USBPD_NbPorts
Argument.Comment: The number of the USBPD ports

Argument.Name: USBPD_PORT0
Argument.Comment: UCPD instance used for USBPD port 0

Argument.Comment: DMA Request RX for USB Port 0

Argument.Comment: DMA Request TX for USB Port 0

Argument.Comment: External Interrupt number for USB port 0
